snippet: James McDonald’s progress is one reason Pittsburgh has improved to 14th in the majors in strikeouts per nine innings.
lead_paragraph: James McDonald’s progress is one reason Pittsburgh has improved to 14th in the majors in strikeouts per nine innings.

headline.seo: Pirates’ James McDonald Is Pitching More Efficiently
headline.main: A More Efficient Pitcher and More Effective One
